content.raw:
As an alternative solution, I've gone ahead and just added that module to our master module: 37a5246

Now the macro will immediately be available for any scripts that call `find_package(ignition-cmake0)`. I had held off on adding to the master module with the concern that it might be "wasteful" to always include it, but it's turned out that just about everything that uses `ign-cmake` has been using this module, so we may as well err on the safe side and just always include it.
